caption.p: Comparison of conventional X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns between ( a) bulk Ti 3Sn sample and ( b) Ti 3Sn powder during the cooling process. ( a) XRD peaks of bulk Ti 3Sn near hexagonal D0 19 phase (002), (201) and (203) crystal faces. ( b) XRD peaks of Ti 3Sn powder near hexagonal D0 19 phase (002), (201) and (203) crystal faces, respectively.
